TopicTitle: How do you load a quicksaved game?

Articles.Content:
See topic title.

Also, is there a list of all the hotkeys anywhere? The wiki is missing at least the quicksave/load buttons.

DP
it is defaultly mapped to F9 to quickload
It's showing up on the wiki for me, are you looking at the old one rather than the one currently linked from the KSP pages and the top of this forum?
